metadata.description: Spells that detect and analyze magical power and effects

spells.name: Sense the Nature of Vis
spells.description: Determines the Art and amount of vis in a substance. Also reveals if a substance contains vis at all.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (sense magical power), +1 Touch, +1 for detailed information

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: Allows you to see magical auras and active spells as a faint glowing outline. Does not identify the specific nature of magic.

spells.name: Scales of the Magical Weight
spells.description: Determines the level of a spell effect, the level of a magical item, or the magnitude of a magical aura.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (analyze magical power), +1 Touch, +1 for precise measurement

spells.name: Piercing the Magical Veil
spells.description: Reveals the complete details of a magical effect - its Arts, level, duration, caster, and function.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (complete magical analysis), +2 Voice, +2 for comprehensive information

spells.name: Sense the Lingering Magic
spells.description: Detects magical effects that have been cast in an area within the last day, week, month, or year depending on their power.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (sense past magic), +1 Touch, +2 Room, +2 for temporal detection

spells.name: Peer Through the Mystic Veil
spells.description: Allows you to see through magical concealment and illusions. You automatically pierce veils, invisibility, and glamours.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (pierce magical concealment), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +4 Vision, +1 for automatic success

spells.name: Reading the Wizard's Sigil
spells.description: Reveals the identity of the magus who cast a spell or created a magical item, if their sigil is present.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (identify magical creator), +1 Touch, +3 for specific identity

spells.name: Converse with Enchantment
spells.description: Allows communication with the intelligence within a magical item, if one exists. The item can explain its powers and history.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (communicate with magic), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +2 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Unraveling the Form of Magic
spells.description: Maps all magical effects, auras, and items within a large area. Provides a complete magical survey of the region.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (comprehensive magical survey), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +4 Boundary, +2 for mapping function
